title: Zed License
description: You may copy and distribute the program freely. This license was found on the "zed-csp" component of texlive 2010. It is Free and GPL-compatible.

must.title: Rename
must.description: Describes the ability to change software's name if modified/distributed.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

fulltext:
You may copy and distribute this file freely. Any queries and complaints should be forwarded to Jim.Davies@comlab.ox.ac.uk.

If you make any changes to this file, please do not distribute the results under the name `zed-csp.sty'.
